2a1('bum): khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sar bya mthar
2a2('bum): mi dmigs so// / sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byad chung sem
2a3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi ma thar mi dmigs so// sa'i khoms ngong na pa'i phyir/ 
2a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams je bo nyid med
2b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs s+ho// sa'i khams med
2b2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpe'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
2b3('bum): sra'i kham sra stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
2b4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i kham dros dben pa 'i phyir/ byang chub sem
2b5('bum): dngo 'phyi ma'i mthar ming darigs/ sa'i khams ngo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub seMng 'a ma'i mtho mi migs/ 
3a1('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// sa'i khams snying pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
3a2('bum): dpa' dbus su mi da ri/ gas so// si'i khams ra ben po'i per/ rang
3a3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbu sa su mi dmigs so// si 'a kham so de ze nying
3a4('bum): mi de pa'i yir/ bang chub sems dpa' dbus su me dmigs so// de ci'i lir zhe na
3a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams med pa dang / so'i khams stong pa nyid dang
3b1('bum): sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ bi ma'i mtha' mi
3b2('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sa'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ si'i khams stong pa nyid kyang
3b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
3b4('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gan na ma yin/ phyi ra'i ratha'
3b5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i du de ltar na sa'i khams med
3b6('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / sri'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / 
3b7('bum): si khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sden gyi mtha' gang
4a1('bum): yin pa dang / pi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med gnyis
4a2('bum): su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// chu'i
4a3('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
4a4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ dang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
4a5('bum): dmigs so// chu'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir
4a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' pi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams dben pa'i pir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
4a7('bum): mi dmigs so// tshu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chu'i khams
4b1('bum): med pa'i pir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chu'i khams dab
4b2('bum): pa'i phyir/ ngang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
4b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra di ti'i bu chu'i khams med pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngan gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ 
4b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chu'i khams med pa yang gzhan pa yin/ chu'i kha mas stong pa nyid kyang gzhar ma yin/ chu'i khams
4b5('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid me da ba yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dang / 'a yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' gan
4b6('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rga'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams
4b7('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngor gyi mtha
4b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma'i khams med
5a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub se de'i sngon gyi mtha' ming dmig so// me'i khams
5a2('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// me'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang
5a3('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar mi dmig so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' be ma'i mthar mi dmig so// me'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bi ma'i
5a4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// me'i khams med pa'i phyir
5a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso//  'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// me
5a6('bum): khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
5a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu me'i khams med pa dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid dang / me'i khams dben pa dang
5a8('bum): me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus mi dmigs te/ me'i khams med pa
5b1('bum): yang gnan ma yin// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan
5b2('bum): ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhar ma yin/ dbus kyang
5b3('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na me'i kham med pa gang yin pa dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / me'i khams dben pa
5b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa ga nga yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngor gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / bya
5b5('bum): mi'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yid pa thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su zar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung
5b6('bum): khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
5b7('bum): so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang
5b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams
6a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir
6a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' bi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
6a3('bum): rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
6a4('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ben ba'i byorabyang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rlu
6a5('bum): khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa
6a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams med pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid da / rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams
6a7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs dri ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rlung gi kha
6a8('bum): med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams dben pa yang gzha
6b1('bum): ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngaza nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpayang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi
6b2('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
6b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ra rlung gi khams med pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
6b4('bum): rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa/ gang yin pa dang / byang chub
6b5('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
6b6('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang de gnyis su med de/ gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shar
6b7('bum): dwa ti'i bu ra mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// na mkha'
6b8('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// namakha'i khams dper ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
7a1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// na mkha'i khams nga ba nyid med pa'i phyirabyang chub sems
7a2('bum): dpa' sdong gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i
7a3('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// na mkha'i khams dben pa'i byer/ byang chub sems dpa'
7a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// na mkha' khams ngo za nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// 
7a5('bum): nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi
7a6('bum): byar/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
7a7('bum): mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
7a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams med pa dang / na mkha'i khams ste nga pa nyid dang / na mkha'i khams dben pa dang / nam mkha
7b1('bum): khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngod gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus pa dmigs te/ nam mkha'i khams med pa
7b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ na mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo
7b3('bum): nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gnad ma yin// dbus
7b4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nam mkha'i khams med pa ga nga yin pa dang / na mkha'i khams stong
7b5('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / namakhri'i khams dben ba gang yin pa dang / na mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
7b6('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de zad kyang gnyi su me gnyisu byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna
7b7('bum): shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
7b8('bum): mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sem
8a1('bum): dpa' sden gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi darig so// rnam par shes pa
8a2('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dbeni de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 
8a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
8a4('bum): su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmi gas so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir
8a5('bum): ngang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i
8a6('bum): zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i
8a7('bum): khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i
8a8('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
8b1('bum): [।]/  ga sa sa ga / mya'ang gnam //  ldamapa 'ad 'du ma sa
8b2('bum): rnyeng ba gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa 'od gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ca ba zhing med pa sa
8b3('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyi su byar
8b4('bum): ring ngo tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngod gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngam
8b5('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpal
8b6('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
8b7('bum): dmigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi rig so// 
8b8('bum): rig pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ma rig pa dben pa'i
9a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
9a2('bum): dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa med pa dang // ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 
9a3('bum): rig pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
9a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngoran gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi mi'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma rig pa med pag
9a5('bum): yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma ri ga pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang
9a6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa'i
9a7('bum): pir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
9a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed nge bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma
9b1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs// 'du byed
9b2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
9b3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
9b4('bum): dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa dang / 'du byed spong pa nyid dang / 'du byang dben pa dang / 'du byed de bo nyid med pa la sngor gyi mtha'
9b5('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus ming migs te/ 'du byed med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa
9b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus
9b7('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed de bo nyid med
9b8('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis
10a1('bum): su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa sred pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
10a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa de bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
10a3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
10a4('bum): dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa de bo nyid meng pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi
10a5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
10a6('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa de bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// / 
10a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa de bo nyid med pa la sden gyi mtha'
10a8('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang
10b1('bum): gzhan ma yid/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
10b2('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
10b3('bum): shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
10b4('bum): med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs stong pa
10b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmi gas so// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang ba
10b6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ma dmigs so// ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sam sa dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs stong
10b7('bum): ba nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med
10b8('bum): ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
11a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs de bo cing reng pa'i phyir/ 
11a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ming dang gzugs med pa dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / ming rang gzugs dben pa dang / ming dang gzugs ngos
11a3('bum): nyid med pa la sngor gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ ming dang gzugs med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan pa yin/ ming dang bzu
11a4('bum): dper ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ming rang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
11a5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ming dang gzugs med pa ga nga yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
11a6('bum): ming dang gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
11a7('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug
11a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug de bo nyid med pa'i phyir
11b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dar gas so// skye mched drug med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byim
11b2('bum): mthar mi ri rigs so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
11b3('bum): skyer meng drug med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// skye mched drug steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ming dmigs so// skye mched drug dber pa'i phyir/ byang chub
11b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zher/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug med pa
11b5('bum): dang skye mched drug stong pa 'di dang / skye mched drug dber pa dang skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi der rigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi migs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ skye mched
11b6('bum): med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug sbeng pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug dber pa yang gzhan ma yin// skye mched drug ri bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
11b7('bum): gnan ma yin/ sder mi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skyer ched drug meng ba gang yin pa dang / 
11b8('bum): mched drug sbeng pa zhing gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug de bo nying med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sder gyi mtha' gang yin par
13a1('bum): rang ror ba sdong pa nying dang / tsher ba dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' ming rigs/ dbus ming rigs te/ rer ba med pa yang gzham
13a2('bum): yid tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan pa yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan pa yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sder gyi mtha' dag nar
13a3('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tsho
13a4('bum): ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yi na pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
13a5('bum): dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de/ nyi su byur med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srad pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
13a6('bum): dmigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// sred pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa
13a7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid
13a8('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa dben ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa sa pa'i phyir/ bang
13b1('bum): chub sems dpa' nga ba'i mthar mi dmigs so// sred pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig
13b2('bum): sa sred pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
13b3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa med pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid dang / sred pa dben pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmig
13b4('bum): te/ sred pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa steng pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa dben pa yang gzha nam yin/ srang ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
13b5('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ nga bus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
13b6('bum): na sred pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sred pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin par
13b7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa med pa'i
13b8('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
14a1('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa reng ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
14a2('bum): dpa' bi ma'i mthur mi dmigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// len pa dber ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 
14a3('bum): len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi de rigs so// len pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa steng pa nyid kyi phyir
14a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
14a5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa med pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid dang / len pa dben pa dang / len pa ngo bo cad
14a6('bum): med pa la sngoran gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ len pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ len pa dben pa
14a7('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa de bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// 
14a8('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na len pa med pa gang yin pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / len pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid
14b1('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon byimatha gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis byang med
14b2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid
14b3('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa med pa'i phyir/ 
14b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
14b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid meng ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// srid pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa
14b6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med
14b7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa med pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid dang / srid pa dben pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid med
14b8('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi mi'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ srid pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// srid pa dben pa yang gzhan ma
15a1('bum): yin/ srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin
15a2('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na srid pa med pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / srid pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa de bo nyid med pa gang
15a3('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang
15a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// 
15a5('bum): skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// skye ba med pa'i
15a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma
15a7('bum): mi dmigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// skye ba med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye ba sdong pa
15a8('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs// skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
15b1('bum): dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba med pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / skye ba dben pa dang / skye ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
15b2('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba dber pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba de bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
15b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi mi'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang
15b4('bum): skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma
15b5('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon bya
15b6('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngoran gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi ngo bo
15b7('bum): med pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpar phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
15b8('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar mi dmig so// rga shi med
16a1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rga shi steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
16a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rga shi nge bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i pir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi med pa dang / rga shi steng pa nyid
16a3('bum): dang / rga 'i dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ byi na'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rga shi med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi steng pa nyid kyang ga ra pa yin
16a4('bum): rga shi dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan pa yi na/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
16a5('bum): gzha ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rga shi med pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi steng pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin par
16a6('bum): rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med
16a7('bum): gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i pir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyir ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
16a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sder gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de bo nyid
16b1('bum): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
16b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol
16b3('bum): phyini pa ngo bo 'di med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
16b4('bum): byin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
16b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir na na// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rog tu phyin pa ma
16b6('bum): pi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngor gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus
16b7('bum): mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ba nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ spyir
16b8('bum): pa'i pha rol byin pa che ba zhing med pa yang gzhadam yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzha ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthar yang bsar ma yin/ dngas kyang bar
17a1('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nying gang yin pa dang / sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin
17a2('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
17a3('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 
17a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
17a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khribs
17a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// / 
17a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
17a8('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi rimigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng pa nyid kyi phyir
17b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ming migs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ba'
17b2('bum): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
17b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sder gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs
17b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kya ngaga'an ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa
17b5('bum): yang gnar ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sem sa dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang ga#
17b6('bum): yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gnan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrim
17b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
17b8('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa
18a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sder gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
18a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngor gyi mthar mi darigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
18a3('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ming rigs so// bzod pa'i phyi rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bzeng ba'i
18a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' khyi thar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ba'i mtha
18a5('bum): mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa meng pa'i phyir
18a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i
18a7('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na
18a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de
18b1('bum): nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang
18b2('bum): gsar ma yin/ bzed ba'i pha rol tu phyir pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sder
18b3('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang
18b4('bum): bzed ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa steng pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ba zod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
18b5('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis
18b6('bum): byad med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bacher 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbeng pa
18b7('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dper ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngor gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ bcom
18b8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi rarigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
19a1('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// brjor 'grus kyi
19a2('bum): pa del tu phyin pa dber pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ming rig
19a3('bum): so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dngos su mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
19a4('bum): su mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bo nyid med
19a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi darigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dra 'ibu brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / brtson
19a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nga ba nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
19a7('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ brtsor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// brtson 'grus kyi pha
19a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
19b1('bum): gzhang ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhar ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ra brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / brjod
19b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 
19b3('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 
19b4('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa me nga ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
19b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyin par bar pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngor gyi mthar pa
19b6('bum): dmigs so// bsam gdar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir
19b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha
19b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ba nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
20a1('bum): mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam gdan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nying
20a2('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dber pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
20a3('bum): phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bas pa
20a4('bum): gtar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa steng pa nyid dang / bsam gta na gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bo nying meng pa la sder gyi mthar mi dmigs
20a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang
20a6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dber pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bang chub sems dpa' yang
20a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sder gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// phyi ra'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bsam gtar gyi
20a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyir pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang // bsam gtar gyi
20b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / bi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
20b2('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes
20b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dber pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 
20b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ bya nga chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
20b5('bum): dba' bye ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa 'phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
20b6('bum): byin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
20b7('bum): so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
20b8('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi
21a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
21a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi darigs/ dbus mi
21a3('bum): dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhar pa yid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dper ba yang gzhan
21a4('bum): yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan pa yi sa sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gan
21a5('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzha ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu na ba med pa gang yin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
21a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga
21a7('bum): yin pa dang / sder gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// 
21a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bar pa der na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sder gyi mthar
21b1('bum): ming rigs so// rang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dber pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
21b2('bum): dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid nge bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ra'i mtha
21b3('bum): mi dmigs so// nang steng pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
21b4('bum): mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
21b5('bum): dpa' dbus su dmigs so// nang steng pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rang stong pa nyid dbar pa'i phyir
21b6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
21b7('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang steng pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
21b8('bum): pa'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nang stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang steng pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhor ma yin/ rang sdong pa nyid dbar pa
22a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang ga' ma yin
22a2('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang
22a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
22a4('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang
22a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems da pa'i sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// byi steng pa
22a6('bum): nyid dper ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngor gyi mthar mi dmigs so// byi stong pa nyid nge bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi steng
22a7('bum): pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi steng pa nyid
22a8('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi steng pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi ste
22b1('bum): pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid
22b2('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhen
22b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byi steng pa nyid med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dber pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid de de nyid red pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
22b4('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa yid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi steng pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan pa yid
22b5('bum): byi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhar ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhar ma yin/ 
22b6('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltarar byi stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / pi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin
22b7('bum): pa dang / pi steng pa nyid po me pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa
22b8('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid red pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ 
23a1('bum): stong pa nying stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar ming dmig
23a2('bum): se/ byi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// byi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
23a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi ra
23a4('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
23a5('bum): dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid steng pa nyid kyi phyir/ bya nga chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa'
23a6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid
23a7('bum): med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / byi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngor gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi
23a8('bum): dmigs te/ byi nang stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang sums kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang
23b1('bum): gnan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhar ma yid/ dbus kyang gnan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
23b2('bum): de ltar na byi nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gang yin pa dang
23b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe
23b4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu steng pa nyid steng pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sem
23b5('bum): dpa' sderan gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid steng pa nyid
23b6('bum): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sbeng pa
23b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid steng pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
23b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i bar/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// 
24a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' nga
24a2('bum): su mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dri stong pa nyid spong
24a3('bum): nyid med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sder gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
24a4('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi nga gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang
24a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhar ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ga zhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
24a6('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gnan ma yin// dbus kyang gnan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyi
24a7('bum): gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo ming med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthar ga
24a8('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su meng de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir khyad
24b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa zhid spong pa yid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir// byang chub
24b2('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
24b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpar phyi
24b4('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang
24b5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir
24b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shar da
24b7('bum): bu chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang // chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang // chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
24b8('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid dber pa yang ga'ang ma yin// chen po steng pa nyid
25a1('bum): bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma
25a2('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang // chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang // chen po sde
25a3('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de
25a4('bum): gnyis su byar red // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor dam pa stong pa nyid sdong pa nyid kyi
25a5('bum): byir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems pa ba sngoran gyi mthar ming dmig so// de na dam pa stong pa nying nge bo 'a
25a6('bum): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong
25a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
25a8('bum): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
25b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// dod dam pa stong pa'i ngo bo zhing med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
25b2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / don
25b3('bum): dam pa spong ba cing ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
25b4('bum): kyang gnan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang ga zhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
25b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang ga zhar ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang lnga na pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa gang
25b6('bum): yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
25b7('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mthar gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas
25b8('bum): stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus pas snga
26a1('bum): pa nyid dper ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpar sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sderan gyi mtha mi dmigaso/ 
26a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'du
26a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nying ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
26a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyi dkyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
26a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems pa'i dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nying ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
26a6('bum): su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus byas
26a7('bum): spong pa nyid ngo bo cid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa'i
26a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gnan ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
26b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gnan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus
26b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / 
26b3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas sdeng
26b4('bum): pa nyid med pa'i pir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 
26b5('bum): 'dus ma bas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
26b6('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma pas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
26b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir// byang chub
26b8('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid meng pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su pi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
27a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas spong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi mig so// rus mapas stong pa cing ngo bo nyid me
27a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa 'od stong pa nyid dang / 'dus pa
27a3('bum): byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid meng pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi mo'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te// 'dus ma bas stong pa nyid med pa yang
27a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma ngas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang
27a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi mchi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gnan ma yin no// 
27a6('bum): tshe dang ldar pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang
27a7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
27a8('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// mtha'
27b1('bum): las 'das pa spong ba nying stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa 'idi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngor gyi mthar ming dmigs
27b2('bum): so mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid meng po'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
27b3('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang
27b4('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
27b5('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
27b6('bum): dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dper pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ bang
27b7('bum): chung sems dpa' dbus su pi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong 'i med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid steng po nyid dang
27b8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te mtha'
28a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mthara' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnan ma yin/ mtha' las ngas pa stong pa cing dben pa yang ga
28a2('bum): ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gnad ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
28a3('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / mthara' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang
28a4('bum): mthara' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / mtha 'alas 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang // sngon gyi mtha'
28a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma
28a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
28a7('bum): dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi darigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med po stong pa nyid ngo bo zhid med pa'i phyi
28a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
28b1('bum): pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dber pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
28b2('bum): rang sder gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i
28b3('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sngor gyi mthar mi
28b4('bum): migs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dab na pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngor gyi mthar ri dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid nge ba
28b5('bum): ring med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid me nga ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ming darig
28b6('bum): so dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
28b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid snang ba nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
28b8('bum): stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
29a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / thog pa dang thar med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nying dper pa ga
29a2('bum): yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
29a3('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su meng de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngor gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med
29a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngo na gyi mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sder gyi mthar mi
29a5('bum): dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// der ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
29a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
29a7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang
29a8('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// der ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir// byang chub
29b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi darigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba med pa
29b2('bum): stong pa nyid med pa dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi
29b3('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ der ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// ngeb pa med pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gan ma yin/ 
29b4('bum): der ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sder gyi ma tha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
29b5('bum): yin dbus kyang gnan pa yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang
29b6('bum): der ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
29b7('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
29b8('bum): sngoran gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
30a1('bum): dpa' sngor gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin steng pa nyid med
30a2('bum): pa'i phyir/ bang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i
30a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir
30a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i
30a5('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// tshe dang
30a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dber pa dang / rang bzhir stong pa nyid ngo bo nying med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig
30a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa
30a8('bum): yang gzhan ma yin// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gnan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mthar yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gal
30b1('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin steng pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong
30b2('bum): pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rab bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sderan gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
30b3('bum): dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha
