276b7('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa ni rireg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa
276b8('bum): dra ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ban tshor bas spong ste/ gang stong badzin tshor ba ma yin te skyeb ma/ 
277a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa pi'i bu ram grangs nges na/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshe rab ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu seng pa srid pas sdang snga/ 
277a2('bum): gang sbeng par di spang ba pa yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha dadwa ti'i bu ler
277a3('bum): pa ni leng pas steng ste/ gang snang ba de ni len pa ma yin te skye ba med / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ler pa ma yin ro// 
277a4('bum): rang ldar pa 'a 'i bu srid par srid pas sbeng ste/ gang spong ba dang srid pa ma yin te skyeb mngang // tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu rang grangs des na/ srid pa'i ma skyas
277a5('bum): pa gang yi bar srid pa ma yin do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba ri skye bas stong ste/ gang steng ba re ni skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa de bu rnam grangs
277a6('bum): ngas ra/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi ni rga shis snang ste/ gang ste/ nga ba de ni rga shi ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shar
277a7('bum): dwa ti'i bu rab grangs ngas ra/ rga shi'i ba skyes pa gang yi pa skye ba ring ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byin par sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyi bas spong ste/ gang spong ba
277a8('bum): ngar sbyar ba'i pha rol tu phyir ba ma yi la skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin par sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyiran
277b1('bum): pas yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu rdul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rdul khrims kyi pha rol 'phrin pas spang ste/ gang spong bar mi tshul khrims kyi pha ro phyi pa
277b2('bum): yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rab grangs des na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ba skyes pa gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin ro// 
277b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzeng ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyid pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan
277b4('bum): nga sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna pe grangs des na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
277b5('bum): ti'i bu brtsed 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang sbeng pa der brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yid 'a skye ba
277b6('bum): ma dang // tshe dang ldan pa sha rang ti'i bu rna grangs nges na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi da// tshe dang ldan
277b7('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtaran gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang steng pa de da bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyid pa ma yid 'askye ba med / 
277b8('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yid pa bsam gtar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
278a1('bum): ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas steng ste/ gang steng ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir ba ma yid skye ba meng ngo // 9
278a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nas grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang spang ba
278a3('bum): nyid ni rang stong pa nyid kyis spong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang stong pa nying ma yin te skye ba med dang // tshe dang ldan pa sha da ti'i bu rnam grangs des ra/ rang snang pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
278a4('bum): gang yin pa de dang stong pa nyid pa yid do// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu byi steng pa nyid ri byi stong pa nyid kyis ste nga ste/ gang sbeng pa de ni byi steng pa nyid ma yin te skye ba
278a5('bum): meng ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rapa grangs des na/ byi stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa gang yin pa de byi steng pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu byi dang steng pa
278a6('bum): nyid de byi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang steng pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna pa grangs nges na/ phyi dang steng ba nyid kyi ma skyes pa
278a7('bum): gang yin pa'ide phyi rang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin
278a8('bum): te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa de spang pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po
278b1('bum): stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang steng ba de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna pa grangs nges ra/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma
278b2('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid pa yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dod dam pa stong pa nyid dadod dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang spong ba de ni der dam pa stong pa nyid
278b3('bum): ma yin te skye ba med do// dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des ra/ ded dpa pa stong pa nyid kyi bskyes pa gang yin pa de ngod dam pa stong pa nyid pa yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa shar
278b4('bum): dwa ti'i bu 'das byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'dus byas stong zanang ma yid de skye ba med // tshe dang ldang pa shar dwa po'i bu
278b5('bum): rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas steng pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yid pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid pa yid do// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bu 'dus pa bas sdang ba nyidade
278b6('bum): 'dus ma pas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang steng pa de ni 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges re/ 'dus pa byas sbeng
278b7('bum): pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid pa yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa spong ba nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis
278b8('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes
279a1('bum): pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ri thog ma med tha
279a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang grangs ngas pa/ thog ma dang tha ma reng
279a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ri dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang
279a4('bum): stong pa de ri ngong ba meng ba stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges ra/ dong ba med pa spong ba nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa dor ba meng
279a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma yir ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhir stong pa nyid ni rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong ba de ni ra ba ning stong ma nying ma yin te
279a6('bum): skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldar pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos
279a7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
279a8('bum): nang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong
279b1('bum): ba nyid kyis spong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang gi mtshan nying stong pa nyid ma yi te skye ba // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa ga
279b2('bum): yid pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'i dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni pi dbigs pa stong pa
279b3('bum): nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
279b4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa steng pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin de skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
279b5('bum): ti'i bu ram grangs nges ra/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyim skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid spong ba zhing
279b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ri ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ram grangs nges ra/  bo zhing stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
279b7('bum): pa re re bo nyid steng pa zhidang pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo zhing stong pa nyid ri dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo zhing stong pa nyid kyis steng ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po med
279b8('bum): pa'i ngo bo zhing stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dam grangs nges na/ dngos po ring pa'i ringo bo nying stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i
280a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dad pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dran pa
280a2('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams
280a3('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin la skye ba me / 
280a4('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yang dag pa ngar spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag pa ra spong ba rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
280a5('bum): bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam sa kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang parnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang
280a6('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po rnams ni dbang po
280a7('bum): rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des ni/ dbang po rnams kyis ma skyes pa gang yin pa dbang
280a8('bum): po rnams ma yi no// tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu stobs rnams na stobs rnams kyis steng ste/ gang stong ba de ni stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shar dra ba'i
280b1('bum): bu rnab grangs nges na/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni nga chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis
280b2('bum): stong ste/ gang sbeng pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang
280b3('bum): yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pas stong ste/ gang stsa
280b4('bum): pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang
280b5('bum): yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa ma ma ra ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i ba ded pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis
280b6('bum): ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam gra ngas des na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes
280b7('bum): ba gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtar rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ribasam ga
280b8('bum): rnams ma yin la skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skye sa pa lam gtad rams ma yin ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti
281a1('bum): bu chang med pa rnams ni chang mang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang spong pa mchang med pa rnams ma yid ge skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
281a2('bum): des na/ tshad med pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa dri tshad med pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i
281a3('bum): stobs par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yid paskye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 
281a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skye sa pa gang yin pa de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
281a5('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis sngo nga ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma yi/ na te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang
281a6('bum): grangs nges na/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
281a7('bum): ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
281a8('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no// / 
281b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smod pa med pas slong
281b2('bum): sde/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam par thar
281b3('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa med pa dang / smor ba med pa ma yin no// 
281b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med ngo // 
281b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mngon pa ra shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mngon pa ra shes pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang ti'i
281b6('bum): bu ting 'dzir rnams ni ting 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ting 'dzin rnams ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs ngas na/ ting 'azin rnams kyi
281b7('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ting 'dzin rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo mas
281b8('bum): ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgon pas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang
282a1('bum): ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni ra bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang snang pa re rang bzhiran gshegs pa'i stobs
282a2('bum): rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de de ba'i nga gshegs pa'i stobs rnam
282a3('bum): ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa gleng ste/ gang stong pa de ni mi 'jigs pa rnams pa yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang
282a4('bum): bur ba grangs des na/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes ba gang yin pa de mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin ro// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu se so yang dag par rig
282a5('bum): pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis steng ste/ gang spong ba de ni so so yang dag par rig pa na pas ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha rangadwa
282a6('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byams pa chen
282a7('bum): ni byams pa chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa der byams pa chen po ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ram grangs des na/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang
282a8('bum): yin par byams pa chen po ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan
282b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal grangs des na/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de snying rje chen po ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
282b2('bum): ri sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges
282b3('bum): na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin to// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid
282b4('bum): ri thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong sde/ gang stong pa de ni tha mas cad shes pa nyid pa yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan ba sha rang ti'i bu rnang grangs des na/ thams cad shes pa nyid
282b5('bum): kyi ba skyes pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis spong ste/ gang stong pa
282b6('bum): ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yod pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma
282b7('bum): yin de// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid kyis sdang ste/ gang spong pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhon pa nyid ma yin pa sres pa
282b8('bum): mang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rapa grangs des na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mi skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhad pa 'ang ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa
283a1('bum): rab 'byor ci'i phyir na nga skad du/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi
283a2('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no// 'ang byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni dang byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mig gi 'grib
283a3('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no// rna ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin/ sna'i grib pa gang yin pa de ni snga ma yin/ lce'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lde ma yin/ lus kyi 'grib
283a4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin/ yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sgra ma
283a5('bum): yin/ dri'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin/ 'grib pa gang yid pa de ni ram yin/ reg gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rag ma yin/ chos kyi 'grib pa gang
283a6('bum): yin pa de ni chos ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes
283a7('bum): ba ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sI'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi
283a8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus
283b1('bum): te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'gi
283b2('bum): ba gang yin pa de ni sde 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de na
283b3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang mi
283b4('bum): ba de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ma yi na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
283b5('bum): tshor rab pa yin/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lde'i 'alus te ga pa'i rkyen
283b6('bum): gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ri lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ri lus kyi 'dus
283b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ma yin/ si'i khams kyi
283b8('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin/ tshi'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin/ me'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams ma yin
284a1('bum): rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ri rlung gi khams ma yin/ na mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni namakha'i khams pa yin
284a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ri rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa
284a3('bum): de ni 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug
284a4('bum): gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin/ re ga pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni reg pa ma yin/ tsher ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i gang
284a5('bum): pa gang yi pa de ni sred pa ma yin/ len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni len pa ma yin/ srid nga'i 'gro ba pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i 'grib pa
284a6('bum): gang yin pa de'i skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rga shi ma yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ chu
284a7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gring pa gang yin pa de ri tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
284a8('bum): ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni bcon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin// bsam gtaran gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni bsam
284b1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol 'byer ba'i 'grib pa gang yid pa de ni shes kyib kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa der rang
284b2('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin/ bya stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang spong ba nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pazhi
284b3('bum): kyi 'gri pa gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid steng pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa
284b4('bum): de ni ngor dam pa steng pa zhing ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa dkyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa zhing ma yi na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de na
284b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' la sa 'dres pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma meng ba
284b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ri thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin
284b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grikha pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin// rang gi mtshan
284b8('bum): nga stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa
285a1('bum): pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid spong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po mod
285a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
285a3('bum): ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ 
285a4('bum): dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib
285a5('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa ra/ nga yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin
285a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni 'bags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin// bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad med
285a7('bum): pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni tshad med pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa

291b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyed kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de 'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pade
